snippet.title: Law of Salvage | Hunt: Showdown
snippet.description:
Law of Salvage is now available! ⛵
 
This DLC contains:
- Captain Laffite (Hunter)
- Scuttled Glory (Winfield 1887 Terminus)
- Knuckle Shunt (Scottfield Model 3 Brawler)
- Hagfish Bronze (Choke Bomb)

The captain awaits... 👇

PC - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585200/Hunt_Showdown__Law_of_Salvage/
PS - https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP4291-CUSA15859_00-THEHUNTGAME00059
Xbox - https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/hunt-showdown-law-of-salvage/9p4t7pv3mdtw

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Get Hunt Showdown on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/HuntSteamYouTube

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/huntshowdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/huntshowdown
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/crytek
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@huntshowdownofficial
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/huntshowdown

#HuntShowdown #Hunt #dlc
